chunks.zh: 刚刷到了奔驰裁员,N+9?!
chunks.en: Just saw news about Mercedes layoffs, N+9?!

chunks.zh: 对比国内各种骚操作,真的太打击了
chunks.en: Compared to the various shady practices in China, this is really disheartening.

chunks.zh: 切实把员工当人而不是牛马👍
chunks.en: Truly treating employees as people instead of livestock. 👍

chunks.zh: @han1988 #16 那管小民什么事情？小民只关注哪些企业也一毛钱都不愿意给，哪些企业给的足足的。
chunks.en: @han1988 #16 What does that have to do with ordinary people? Ordinary people only care about which companies are unwilling to give even a penny, and which companies give enough.

chunks.zh: 这就是国外企业和中国企业的区别，国外的企业招聘你进去是要考虑你的家庭你的未来情况，假设真的经营不下去裁员也要考虑你未来的家庭和你找工作的情况，我们国家的企业把员工当成什么，是工具，紧急需要时花重金挖过来，要裁员了就是想着不花钱裁员或者少花钱裁员，根本不明白很多人的工作背后是一个家庭，很多人被裁员几乎就意味着房贷的断供和家庭的毁灭，他们就连这 n+1 的缓冲补偿都不想掏
chunks.en: This is the difference between foreign and Chinese companies. Foreign companies consider your family and future when hiring you. If they really can't operate and have to lay off employees, they also consider your family and job search situation. What do companies in our country treat employees as? As tools. They spend a lot of money to poach you when they urgently need you, and when they want to lay you off, they think about laying you off without spending money or spending as little money as possible. They don't understand that many people's jobs support a family, and being laid off almost means mortgage default and family destruction. They don't even want to pay this n+1 buffer compensation.

chunks.zh: 对于这种行为，我们应时刻警惕____，严厉打击_____，完善______，从而______，最终_______。
chunks.en: Regarding this kind of behavior, we should always be vigilant of ____, severely crack down on _____, improve ______, so that ______, and ultimately _______.

chunks.zh: @sagaxu 哦，你又扯净利润率了？汽车主机厂这种重资产净利润率 10 以下有什么奇怪的？但是实际盈利和净利润你不会看？ 100 的 10%和 1 亿的 10%有什么区别用别人教你？至于什么人均，一线普工在比亚迪都不算人，别扯人均 ；低价内卷路线是自己选的，质量差是自己造的，赖不了别人。什么超过 90%以上的私营企业，你最好加点定语，大规模重资产行业就不主看净利润率。什么去欧美设厂，想屁呢，不要说人力相关问题，就这些垃圾比亚迪之流，流水线工厂就一堆问题，轮不到人力问题
chunks.en: @sagaxu Oh, are you talking about net profit margin again? What's so strange about a heavy asset car manufacturer having a net profit margin of less than 10%? But can't you see the difference between actual profit and net profit? Do you need someone to teach you the difference between 10% of 100 and 10% of 100 million? As for per capita, front-line workers at BYD are not even considered people, so don't talk about per capita. The low-price, involution route was their own choice, and the poor quality was their own making, so they can't blame others. As for over 90% of private enterprises, you better add some qualifiers. Large-scale, heavy asset industries don't primarily look at net profit margin. What about setting up factories in Europe and the United States? Don't even think about it. Not to mention human resources issues, these garbage companies like BYD have a bunch of problems with their assembly line factories, so it's not even about human resources issues.

chunks.zh: @winglight2016 国内很多做到世界第一的企业也做不到这个地步
chunks.en: @winglight2016 Many domestic companies that have become world leaders can't even do this.

chunks.zh: @han1988 那么，如果按 N+1 或者 2N 的话，符合中国法律规定吗？
chunks.en: @han1988 So, if it's according to N+1 or 2N, does that comply with Chinese law?

chunks.zh: 体面
chunks.en: Decent

chunks.zh: 这说明奔驰的利润高，品牌溢价高，分给员工那些不过是九牛一毛，但至少还把员工当人看，是个体面人，比国内那些吃干抹净的企业强太多了，难怪大家挤破头去外企。
chunks.en: This shows that Mercedes has high profits and high brand premium. What they give to employees is just a drop in the bucket, but at least they still treat employees as people and are decent. This is much better than those domestic companies that exploit everything, which is why everyone is scrambling to go to foreign companies.

chunks.zh: @zuosiruan 只是你傻。奔驰要把中国的利润汇出中国，不能留被劳动纠纷卡脖子的风险。前几年，推特一下子裁掉了一半的员工几千人，马斯克说我已经做得比法律规定还要好了，法律规定提前两个月通知我干脆明天就不让他上班了，但是我给三个月的经济补偿。当然有的互联网大公司比如说 Facebook ，感觉到员工跟随自己多年没有辛劳也有苦劳，所以在裁掉员工的时候给予了 4 个月的补偿金。
chunks.en: @zuosiruan You're just stupid. Mercedes wants to remit profits from China back to China and can't risk being strangled by labor disputes. A few years ago, Twitter suddenly laid off half of its employees, thousands of people. Musk said I've already done better than the law requires. The law requires two months' notice, but I'm simply not letting them work starting tomorrow, and I'm giving them three months' severance pay. Of course, some large internet companies like Facebook feel that employees have followed them for many years and have worked hard, so they give 4 months of compensation when laying off employees.

chunks.zh: @nickyadance23 别想了，别人都按平均月薪算，这一点就比垃圾比亚迪华为之流强不知道多少
chunks.en: @nickyadance23 Don't even think about it. Others calculate based on average monthly salary, which is much better than garbage companies like BYD and Huawei.

chunks.zh: @han1988 论迹不论心都是国人，就你聪明就你能耐是吧
chunks.en: @han1988 Judging by actions, not intentions, that's what all Chinese people do, are you saying you're the only smart and capable one?

chunks.zh: @crocoBaby 能到中国来开公司的知名外企，哪个不是凤毛麟角？奔驰去年可是万亿级营收，利润率约行业 2 倍，单车净利润 4 万，中国同行最高的也不到其 1/3 。比亚迪员工数量是奔驰的 5 倍，单利润只有奔驰一半，食物链中不同的位置，钱无法凭空出来。
chunks.en: @crocoBaby Which well-known foreign company that can come to China to open a company isn't a rarity? Mercedes had trillion-yuan revenue last year, with a profit margin about twice the industry average and a net profit of 40,000 per car. The highest of its Chinese counterparts is less than 1/3 of that. BYD has 5 times the number of employees as Mercedes, but only half the profit. Different positions in the food chain, money can't come from thin air.

chunks.zh: 这就是你们一直喊着支持国产，支持你**，
chunks.en: This is why you keep shouting about supporting domestic products, supporting your **,

chunks.zh: @hurryboys #59你是意林作者吗？“国外的企业招聘你进去是要考虑你的家庭你的未来情况“我就在 500 强的外企，我怎么没看到 HR 请人的时候有问家庭情况？
chunks.en: @hurryboys #59 Are you an Yi Lin author (referencing a magazine with emotional stories)? "Foreign companies consider your family and future when hiring you." I'm in a Fortune 500 foreign company, why haven't I seen HR asking about family situations when hiring?

chunks.zh: 好像是：N 十 9 十 2 个月工资十年终奖
chunks.en: Seems like: N + 9 + 2 months of salary + ten years of year-end bonus.

chunks.zh: @shadowyue #12 共同富裕，共同富裕
chunks.en: @shadowyue #12 Common prosperity, common prosperity.

chunks.zh: 外企也分 369 等的，你看四大是不是外企，加班裁员一样不少，赔偿也就标准 n+1总体上来说，本土化越低的外企待遇越好，再就是欧>美>日韩>港台
chunks.en: Foreign companies are also divided into different levels. Look at the Big Four, aren't they foreign companies? There's still a lot of overtime and layoffs, and the compensation is just the standard n+1. Generally speaking, the lower the localization of a foreign company, the better the treatment. Also, Europe > America > Japan/Korea > Hong Kong/Taiwan.

chunks.zh: @sagaxu 想多了，比亚迪现在营收和利润比十年前翻很多了，一线工资有什么变化
chunks.en: @sagaxu You're overthinking it. BYD's revenue and profits are much higher now than they were ten years ago. What changes have there been in front-line wages?

chunks.zh: @sagaxu 那你想说啥呢，比亚迪财也有财务好的时候，一线薪水有变化吗？？？
chunks.en: @sagaxu So what are you trying to say? BYD also has times when its finances are good. Have there been any changes in front-line salaries???
